00023 #ifndef ATTRIBUTE_MODIFIER_LIST_TEST_H
00024 #define ATTRIBUTE_MODIFIER_LIST_TEST_H
00025 
00026 #include <cppunit/extensions/HelperMacros.h>
00027 #include <cppunit/portability/Stream.h>
00028 
00029 #include <attributemodifierlist.h>
00030 #include <string>
00031 
00032 using namespace RainbruRPG::Network::Ident;
00033 
00037 template<class TESTEDCLASS> 
00038 class AttributeModifierListTest : public CPPUNIT_NS::TestFixture 
00039 {
00040 
00042   CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE( AttributeModifierListTest );
00043 
00044   CPPUNIT_TEST( testIfNull );
00045   CPPUNIT_TEST( testStep1 );
00046   CPPUNIT_TEST( testStep2 );
00047   CPPUNIT_TEST( testStep3 );
00048   CPPUNIT_TEST( testUnsigned );
00049   CPPUNIT_TEST( testTotalString );
00050 
00051 
00053   CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_END();
00054 protected:
00058   TESTEDCLASS   *m_testedClass;
00059   
00060 public:
00066   int countTestCases(){
00067     return 1;
00068   }
00069 
00073   void setUp(){ 
00074     this->m_testedClass = new TESTEDCLASS; 
00075   }
00076   
00080   void tearDown(){ 
00081     delete this->m_testedClass; 
00082   }
00083 
00090   void testIfNull(){
00091     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( this->m_testedClass->getTotal()==0 );
00092   }
00093 
00101   void testStep1(){
00102     this->m_testedClass->addModifier("+2");
00103     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( this->m_testedClass->getTotal()==2 );
00104     this->m_testedClass->addModifier("+3");
00105     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( this->m_testedClass->getTotal()==5 );
00106     this->m_testedClass->addModifier("+12");
00107     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( this->m_testedClass->getTotal()==17 );
00108 
00109   }
00110 
00118   void testStep2(){
00119     this->m_testedClass->addModifier("-10");
00120     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( this->m_testedClass->getTotal()==-10 );
00121     this->m_testedClass->addModifier("-4");
00122     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( this->m_testedClass->getTotal()==-14 );
00123     this->m_testedClass->addModifier("+2");
00124     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( this->m_testedClass->getTotal()==-12 );
00125 
00126   }
00127 
00135   void testStep3(){
00136     this->m_testedClass->addModifier("+10");
00137     this->m_testedClass->addModifierInverse("+10");
00138     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( this->m_testedClass->getTotal()==0 );
00139 
00140     this->m_testedClass->addModifier("-4");
00141     this->m_testedClass->addModifierInverse("-4");
00142     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( this->m_testedClass->getTotal()==0 );
00143   }
00144 
00151   void testUnsigned(){
00152     this->m_testedClass->addModifier("10");
00153     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( this->m_testedClass->getTotal()==0 );
00154   }
00155 
00161   void testTotalString(){
00162     std::string s;
00163     this->m_testedClass->addModifier("+2");
00164     s=this->m_testedClass->getTotalString();
00165     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( s=="+2" );
00166 
00167     this->m_testedClass->addModifierInverse("+2");
00168     s=this->m_testedClass->getTotalString();
00169     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( s=="" );
00170 
00171     this->m_testedClass->addModifier("-4");
00172     s=this->m_testedClass->getTotalString();
00173     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( s=="-4" );
00174 
00175   }
00176 };
00177 
00178 
00179 #endif //ATTRIBUTE_MODIFIER_LIST_TEST_H
